import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid } from '@material-ui/core'; import styles from './Cards.module.css'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; import cx from 'classnames'; // apply multiple classes const Cards = ({ data: { confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate } }) => { if(!confirmed) { return 'Loading...'; } return (
Infected {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of active Cases of Covid-19 Recovered {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of recoveries from Covid-19 Deaths {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of deaths from Covid-19
); }; export default Cards;
